Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/50th Ave
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/50th Ave

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/50th Ave.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line and Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line & Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing with delays due to track switching problems near Belmont. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing with delays due to track switching problems near Belmont.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Linden provide additional connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
